official_title: A bill to provide supplemental authority to the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for the purpose of providing annual contributions for the operation of low-income housing projects.

summary.text: Increases the amount of funds authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development after fiscal year 1980 for annual contributions to public housing agencies for the operation of low-income housing projects.

titles.title: A bill to provide supplemental authority to the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for the purpose of providing annual contributions for the operation of low-income housing projects.
